title: We ranked the new iOS 15.4 features from best to worst
content:
It’s that time again, people! The long-awaited iOS 15.4 is finally here — and that means one thing and one thing only: it’s time to rank the new features soon to be on your iPhone. We’ve done this a few times before — whether that’s rating each iOS 14.5 update by how much they’ll annoy Zuckerberg, or those in iOS 14.7 by how useful the new features would be in space. And this time? Well, we’re gonna be boring and rank them from worst to best. What? Don’t complain! All this means is the next Apple ranking will be even…

This story continues at The Next Web

Or just read more coverage about: iOS
description: Want to know the best new iOS 15.4 features? Well, we've got all of you Apple and iPhone fans covered. Thank us later.
